ValidationRule.description: Ensure where the plan is premier that the csm owner has been populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Handover_Status__c, 'Accepted By Support'), ISBLANK(CSM_Owner__c), Highest_Success_Plan__c == 'Premier' )
